revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #44 Coba |image = [[File:Coba.png]] |caption = This Berry is said to be a new kind that is a cross of two Berries brought together by winds from far away. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 29 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,800 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} '''Coba''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with between 10 and 15 points of dry, between 15 and 20 points of bitter, and 0 points of all other flavors. The [[Chesto]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 hours 30 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 4 hours 30 mins || 5 hours 30 mins - 11 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CobaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CobaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CobaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours 30 mins -
11 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 3 hours 40 mins -
7 hours 20 mins || 44 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 26 mins 40 secs -
4 hours 53 mins 20 secs || 30 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following ways to obtain Coba berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]

[[Wiki]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |- style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! No Modifier !! Planting Time with

Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aguav]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 27 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- | colspan=4| '''OR''' |- | [[Wiki]] || - || - || - |- | [[Aguav]] || 5 mins 50 secs until ripe || 3 mins 53 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
